original: Ekblom, Sven Gösta, hovrättsassessor, Jönköping, f. 8/10/07 i Arvika ’ av färghandl. Axel E. o. Ida Lundberg. G. 38 m. Röda kors-syster Inga Holmström. Barn: Kerstin f. 40, Ingrid 41, Håkan 45. — Jur. kand. i Upps. 31. Tingstjg. i Jösse doms. 31-34, e. fiskal i Göta hovr. 35, isekr. i Hali. mell. doms. 36-39, adj. led. i Göta hovr. 40, assessor där sed. 42. Uppdr. i folkhushålln :dep. 43 o. i just:dep. 46, sekr. i komm :lagskomm. 46.
translated: Ekblom, Sven Gösta, Court of Appeal Assessor, Jönköping, b. October 8th, 1907 in Arvika to paint merchant Axel E. and Ida Lundberg. Married in 1938 to Red Cross nurse Inga Holmström. Children: Kerstin b. 1940, Ingrid b. 1941, Håkan b. 1945. Graduated with a law degree from Uppsala University in 1931. Served as a court clerk in Jösse district court from 1931 to 1934, then as a deputy prosecutor in Göta Court of Appeal in 1935, a lower court judge in Hali district court from 1936 to 1939, and an assistant judge in Göta Court of Appeal in 1940. Appointed as a court of appeal assessor since 1942. Appointed to government committees in the field of public economy in 1943 and in the Ministry of Justice in 1946, and served as secretary in the municipal legislative committee in 1946.
